#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long int n1,n2,i,j,diff,min=9999999;
    cin>>n1;
    long long int a[n1];
    for(i=0;i<n1;i++)
    cin>>a[i];
    cin>>n2;
    long long int b[n2];
    for(i=0;i<n2;i++)
    cin>>b[i];
    
    for(i=0;i<n1;i++)
    {
    for(j=0;j<n2;j++)
    {
                     diff=a[i]-b[j];
                     
                     if(diff<0)
                     diff=-diff;
                     
                     if(diff<min)
                     min=diff;
    }
    }
    cout<<min<<endl;
    return 0;
}
